title: Fuck Placements
body:
Last season = Bronze 3

This season = 9 / 1 in placements

I GOT PLACED IN FUCKING BRONZE 3!!!

replies.body:
Beginning of season is a soft reset (your mmr goes down a couple of divisions from where you ended last season).
Unless you climbed **significantly **in preseason, you aren't going to go up by much (if at all), even if you win all of your placements. Its ok though, you get to start again where you left off :) 

Good luck with the climb ♥

[You can find the official statement about the soft reset here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/2016-ranked-season-kicks-soon)

You will usually end up lower than your rank last season, by at least one div, for most two or more. So the fact that you did not drop at all meant you had a good mmr for your div and did well in placements. This isn't something to complain about.

Ended at B3, fought to B1 in preseason, won 8/2 promos, B5.

But look at the bright side, the more times you have to fight tooth and nail to get better, the easier the game will seem when you get to a point where there are actually competent people surrounding you.
i WAS B2 won 7 placements and got b5 so deal with it
You're mad because you didn't get a freebie rise in rank? Righto.
its alright ull have good MMR so u can climb easier just keep winning more than you lose
